actions.command: age_of_exile stat give @s exact spell_light_damage GLOBAL_INCREASE origin_aoe1 7 7

age_of_exile stat give @s exact spell_light_damage FLAT origin_aoe5 5 5
age_of_exile stat give @s exact inc_aoe FLAT origin_aoe6 15 15
